en.title: Appliance Repair Service Management | PraticOS
en.description: Manage field service teams and control your appliance repair technicians. System with route planning, customer history and visit checklist. Perfect for field service.
en.keywords: appliance repair software, home appliance service management, field service app, technician dispatch software, appliance service scheduling
en.ogDescription: Manage field service teams and control your technicians. System with route planning, customer history and visit checklist.

hero.title: Manage your field team:
hero.subtitle: 70% of services are at the customer's home. Control routes, see where each technician is and send automatic WhatsApp updates. Complete history of each customer and appliance.

problems.title: Do you face
problems.subtitle: Common pain points for appliance repair service providers

items.title: Unplanned travel
items.text: Technicians wasting time in traffic because visits weren't organized by region. Wasted fuel.

items.title: No customer history
items.text: Customer calls and you don't know what was already done on their appliance. Waste time asking everything again.

items.title: Don't know where the team is
items.text: Technician left for a service call and you have no visibility. Customer calls asking and you can't answer.

items.title: Customer asking about technician
items.text: Constant calls: 'Did the technician leave yet?' 'What time will they arrive?' Interrupts your admin work.

items.title: Parts control in vehicle
items.text: Technician uses a part and forgets to report. Vehicle stock outdated, part missing at critical moment.

items.title: Collection and defaults
items.text: Customer doesn't pay on the spot, technician returns without payment. Hard to track who owes and how much.

solutions.title: How
solutions.subtitle: Features designed for field service teams

items.title: Integrated routing
items.text: Organize visits by region and integrate with Google Maps.
items.highlight: Reduce travel time by up to 40%.

items.title: Complete customer history
items.text: See all previous visits for that customer. Appliances, defects, parts replaced.

items.title: Team visibility
items.text: Know in real time where each technician is and the status of each service call.

items.title: Automatic WhatsApp
items.text: Customer receives notification when technician leaves for service.

items.title: Stock per technician
items.text: Control the parts each technician has in their vehicle. Automatic deduction when used.

items.title: Signature and receipt
items.text: Customer signs on the technician's phone. Receipt sent immediately via WhatsApp.

checklist.title: Technical
checklist.text: Document each visit with photos and appliance data. Protect yourself from complaints and have complete history.

items.text: Appliance photo (before and after)
Model, brand and serial number
Technical verification checklist
Reported defect and applied solution
Parts used in service
Customer digital signature

items.title: Digital WO with photo
items.text: Create work orders with appliance intake photo. Complete service documentation.

items.title: Custom checklist
items.text: Build specific checklists by appliance type. Refrigerator, washing machine, air conditioner.

items.title: Mobile signature
items.text: Customer signs on the technician's phone. Digital receipt sent immediately.

items.title: Warranty control
items.text: Automatic warranty expiration alerts. Opportunity for proactive contact.

items.title: Integrated financials
items.text: Payment tracking by technician. Automatic commissions and transfers.

items.title: Productivity reports
items.text: See how many visits each technician completed. Average time per visit.

testimonial.quote: Before I didn't know where my technicians were and customers called all the time. Now I have total visibility and customers receive automatic updates via WhatsApp.
testimonial.name: Carlos Mendes

faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: Get your questions answered before you start

items.question: Do I need to pay to use it?
items.answer: No! The free plan is real and has no time limit. You can use it forever with up to 30 photos/month. Our pricing is transparent and you don't need to talk to a salesperson.

items.question: Does it work for field service?
items.answer: Yes! PraticOS was made for field service. Technicians use it on their phone during visits, with or without internet. Syncs when connection returns.

items.question: Can I see where my technicians are?
items.answer: Yes! The system shows each technician's status in real time: on the way, in service, finished. You have complete team visibility.

items.question: Does the customer get notified?
items.answer: Yes! The customer receives an automatic WhatsApp message when the technician leaves for the service and when it's finished. Drastically reduces calls.

items.question: What if I need help?
items.answer: We have email support and complete documentation. We respond within 24 business hours. Our team knows the daily routine of appliance repair services.

download.title: Download now and
download.text: Available for iOS and Android. Start free!

contact.title: Need
contact.subtitle: Our team is ready to assist you
